summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 3152, entitled "An Ordinance to prevent and punish the conducting, managing, carrying on and taking any part in any dance in any saloon or place where intoxicating or place connected, directly or indirectly, with any such saloon or place where intoxicating or malt liquors are sold, given away of disposed of, declaring such dances a nuisance, and providing for the abatement thereof," approved December 27, 1893.
